snippet: Mr. Prial’s down-to-earth Wine Talk column in The New York Times catered to ever more sophisticated connoisseurs of fine food and drink.
abstract: Frank J Prial, former New York Times columnist whose Wine Talk column introduced many Americans to world of fine wine in 1970s, dies at age 82.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Prial’s down-to-earth Wine Talk column in The New York Times catered to ever more sophisticated connoisseurs of fine food and drink.

headline.seo: Frank J. Prial, a Guide to the World of Fine Wine, Dies at 82
headline.main: Frank J. Prial, a Guide to the World of Fine Wine, Dies at 82
headline.print_headline: Frank J. Prial, 82, a Guide To the World of Fine Wine
